participant_2.background:
I made many memories with my family last year.
i am married to a man.
I start my morning with a walk around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.

i have a marketing job.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go for walks around the neighborhood to get some fresh air and see what's going on at the local shops.
That sounds lovely, I love going for walks too! I have two chiuahuahs, they love walks.
Oh that's cute, I love dogs! I used to work as a circus freak, showing off my third thumb to the public.
That's so cool! I've never met a circus freak before. What did you like about that job?
I liked meeting new people and getting to be creative. It was also really fun to be able to show off my third thumb.
That sounds like a great job. I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Thanks! I am, it was a lot of fun.
What do you do for work now?
I work in marketing, it's a lot of fun and I get to use my creative side.
That sounds like a great job too! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I am, it's a good fit for me.
What are your hobbies?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
Those sound like great hobbies! I love to read too, it's so relaxing.
Me too, it's my favorite way to de-stress.
What are your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Stephen King, he's my favorite author.
I've never read any Stephen King, but I've heard good things about him.
You should definitely check him out, he's a great writer.
I will, thanks for the recommendation
